ygData.subject: Re: One word (well, two) Yiz Pon
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to type fast to get messages in before my boss peeks around into my office, so I don t spell check, I don t even proofread.  I just type and send.  So
ygData.messageBody:
I have to type fast to get messages in before my boss peeks around into
my office, so I don't spell check, I don't even proofread. I just type
and send. So sue me!
